posts.post_title: WTB N28 Bennett - Last Card for Complete Set
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I'm hoping for a low-grade Chas. Bennett... card #50 of 50 for me!  Less than $100 would be ideal,

Richard

Bump to re-inquire... anyone have an extra low-grade Bennett?  Last card that I need for the set,

Richard
